infos.value: Hmph. That all you got? I have to admit, I'm a little disappointed.
Was expecting to have a bit more fun with you. Such a pity...
Still got some life in you, huh? Not yet ready to die? Heh heh heh!
Well? What's the matter? Plead for your life!
Hmph, how boring. Already at your dying breaths.
Let me put you out of your misery.
There's no one easier to defeat...than a cocky little lowlife.
She went and jumped off the damn cliff.
Heh heh heh. Now things are getting interesting. Cling to life, if that's how it is...
Next time we meet, I'm going to make you beg for death!
